title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Using Non Directional Beacons
description:
In this video I will show you have you can use Non Directional Beacons (NDB's) in MSFS 2020. In this video we will take off from Rotterdam The Hague Airport and fly to one of the NDB's which is close to the airport. After that we try to fly to another NDB beacon which for some reason isn't picked up by the aircraft so time for some more investigation on that one.

I will use Little NavMap to find the information in addition to the build-in flight planner of MSFS 2020. If you also want to give Little NavMap follow the steps in this video to configure it for MSFS 2020 use:

https://youtu.be/1KYuA69vgNw
